name: zkEVM Coffee and Conversations
description:
Casual conversations about zkEVM and rollups over coffee and tea hosted by Scroll in the lobby of the Chedi Ballroom (co-working space).

Open to anyone interested in zkEVM (begginer - advanced). If you are new zkEVMs come talk with experts and learn something new. If you are already deep in the space, feel free to come have in-depth conversations with similar folks.
